<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Buildah Feature Status returns the buildah feature status</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v33.00/statuses/buildah"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorCI"}
```



Returns the buildah status.

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

BuildahFeatureStatus holds the response for the buildah feature status
